title: upgrade to master（v6.2.0），the metrics of unified read pool cpu does not display properly
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
TiKV Control (tikv-ctl) 
Release Version:   6.2.0-alpha
Edition:           Community
Git Commit Hash:   0dff1be50281c72c55c5464751cd733032115ce4
Git Commit Branch: heads/refs/tags/v6.2.0-alpha
UTC Build Time:    2022-07-19 11:03:30
Rust Version:      rustc 1.62.0-nightly (7c4b47696 2022-04-30)
Enable Features:   pprof-fp jemalloc mem-profiling portable sse test-engine-kv-rocksdb test-engine-raft-raft-engine cloud-aws cloud-gcp cloud-azure
Profile:           dist_release

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
8core、16GB

### Steps to reproduce
upgrade to master（v6.2.0） from v5.4.0

### What did you expect?
he metrics of unified read pool cpu can display properly

### What did happened?
upgrade to master（v6.2.0），the metrics of unified read pool cpu does not display properly
![RTL5A9HJj4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/84712107/180366443-0b8320d4-ba86-4d63-91f7-985cebc2ca0c.jpg)
